20505.title: bertha
20505.credit_line: Gift of Mrs. M. B. Thomas Estate
20505.medium_support: machine-made cotton net embroidered with cotton (tambour and needle run)

extended_text.content: The development of machine-made net resulted in new fashions in lace. With its delicacy of design and workmanship, this is an exceptionally fine example of decorated net. Outlines and details of large flowers are worked on tightly stretched net in a chain stitch with a tambour hook. The "fillings" are embroidered by hand. The small flowers and leavers are worked by tambour.
extended_text.title: Gallery Label
